[
  "The collapse of the pension fund is a calamitous event, a direct result of years of gross mismanagement and unforgivable neglect.",
  "Thousands of retirees, who dedicated their lives to public service, have been callously betrayed and now face a future of financial ruin and profound uncertainty.",
  "The aftermath is a tragic landscape of broken promises and ruined lives, a terrible stain on our state's history that will not soon be forgotten. The failure is so absolute it defies simple explanation."
]
